info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 8:26PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Laurens, east central Abbeville and central Greenwood Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 826 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Greenwood, or near Cokesbury, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenwood, Clinton, Ninety Six, Cross Hill, Cokesbury, Waterloo, Hodges, Lake Greenwood State Park, Lake Greenwood and Greenwood State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
